mapper.select: SELECT /* FeedbackMapper.xml, getProdNotiWDGoodCount, SAC : 김현일 , 2014-02-04 */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_PROD_NOTI_WD N , TB_DP_PROD_NOTIGOOD NG WHERE N.TENANT_ID = NG.TENANT_ID AND N.NOTI_SEQ = NG.NOTI_SEQ AND N.NOTI_TYPE_CD = 'DP000401' AND N.DEL_YN = 'N' AND N.BAD_NOTI_YN IN ( 'N', 'R' ) AND N.SPAM_YN = 'N' AND N.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND NG.NOTI_SEQ = #{notiSeq} AND NG.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND NG.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}

SELECT /* FeedbackMapper.xml, getProdNotiGoodCount, SAC : 김현일 , 2014-02-04 */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_PROD_NOTI N , TB_DP_PROD_NOTIGOOD NG WHERE N.TENANT_ID = NG.TENANT_ID AND N.NOTI_SEQ = NG.NOTI_SEQ AND N.NOTI_TYPE_CD = 'DP000401' AND N.DEL_YN = 'N' AND N.BAD_NOTI_YN IN ( 'N', 'R' ) AND N.SPAM_YN = 'N' AND N.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND NG.NOTI_SEQ = #{notiSeq} AND NG.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND NG.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}

SELECT /* FeedbackMapper.xml, getProdEvalInfo, SAC : 남궁석호 , 2014-02-13 */ (SELECT RTRIM ( XMLAGG ( XMLELEMENT (A, CONCAT (AVG_SCORE_PCT, ',')).EXTRACT ('//text()')), ',') FROM ( SELECT AVG_SCORE , NVL (AVG_COUNT, 0) AS PATICPERS_CNT , NVL (ROUND ( (AVG_COUNT / PATICPERS_CNT) * 100, 1), 0) AS AVG_SCORE_PCT FROM (SELECT TA.AVG_SCORE , AVG_COUNT , (SELECT PATICPERS_CNT FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}) AS PATICPERS_CNT FROM (SELECT AVG_SCORE , COUNT (AVG_SCORE) AS AVG_COUNT FROM TB_DP_MBR_AVG WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId} GROUP BY AVG_SCORE) MA , (SELECT AVG_SCORE FROM (SELECT '1' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL)) TA WHERE MA.AVG_SCORE(+) = TA.AVG_SCORE) ORDER BY AVG_SCORE DESC)) AS AVG_EVLU_SCORE_PCTS , NVL (TOT_EVLU_SCORE, 0) TOT_EVLU_SCORE , NVL (PRCHS_CNT, 0) AS DWLD_CNT , NVL ((CASE WHEN (AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 0 AND AVG_EVLU_SCORE < 1) THEN 1 WHEN AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 5 THEN 5 ELSE ROUND (AVG_EVLU_SCORE, 1) END), 0) AS AVG_EVLU_SCORE , NVL (PATICPERS_CNT, 0) AS PATICPERS_CNT , TRIM ( NVL ( TO_CHAR ( (TOT_EVLU_SCORE / PATICPERS_CNT) / 5.0 * 100, '99900.00'), '0')) AS AVG_EVLU_SCORE_PCT FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT /* FeedbackMapper.xml, getScoreList, SAC : 남궁석호 , 2014-02-13 */ AVG_SCORE , NVL (AVG_COUNT, 0) AS PATICPERS_CNT , NVL (ROUND ( (AVG_COUNT / PATICPERS_CNT) * 100, 1), 0) AS AVG_SCORE_PCT FROM (SELECT TA.AVG_SCORE , AVG_COUNT , (SELECT PATICPERS_CNT FROM TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}) AS PATICPERS_CNT FROM (SELECT AVG_SCORE , COUNT (AVG_SCORE) AS AVG_COUNT FROM TB_DP_MBR_AVG WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId} GROUP BY AVG_SCORE) MA , (SELECT AVG_SCORE FROM (SELECT '1' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS AVG_SCORE FROM DUAL)) TA WHERE MA.AVG_SCORE(+) = TA.AVG_SCORE) ORDER BY AVG_SCORE DESC
